name: @polyn/async-events
description: An async event emitter for NodeJS with support for emitting events (not waiting for subscriptions to be satisfied), and publishing events (waiting for subscriptions to be satisfied)

scripts.test: node test.js -r nyan && npm run test:ts -- -r nyan
scripts.test:coverage:ci: mkdir ./coverage && touch ./coverage/lcov.info && npm run test:ts -- -r tap && nyc node test.js -r tap,summary && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov > ./coverage/lcov.info

author: losandes
